metadata.bookAuthor: H. W. Brands; T. H. Breen; R. Hal Williams; Ariela J. Gros
metadata.title: POST 10 08

config.question: The decline of the spirit of deference in the 1820s and 1830s was one example of an emerging __________.

answer_3.response: Observers noted a shift in attitudes between groups in American society in the early 1800s, which accompanied an expansion of the electorate.

answer_2.response: Observers noted a shift in attitudes between groups in American society in the early 1800s, which accompanied an expansion of the electorate.
